title: Is OCE's playerbase really small enough to warrant draft pick be disabled during the morning?
body:
Right now, if you're in New Zealand (which I am) you don't get to play draft pick until 1PM. Lunch. We go the entire morning with no orderly gameplay at all. Is our playerbase really that small to warrant this?

Surely Draft pick could open up to around 7AM for Aus/9AM for NZ.

replies.body: no its not on weekends atleast but early mornings during weekdays the playerbase can be preety low, I think they should just renable it like 2 or 3 hours earlier then what they do now
the player base is small sure but i know for a fact people play games all hours, there is no way with such a popular game that you'd never end up finding a match because of how "small" we are
